note.p: Burial Place: The Bayes and Cotton family vault in Bunhill Fields, the Nonconformist burial ground at Moorgate
References: R W Home, 'Some Manuscripts on Electrical and Other Subjects Attributed to Thomas Bayes, FRS' in NR 1974-5 vol 29 pp 81-90
J D Holland, 'An Eighteenth-Century Pioneer - Richard Price, DD, FRS (1723-1791)' in NR 1968 vol 23 pp 43-64

Notes: DNB (MP) dates differ from those given in index to BR, which gives 1702 as the birth date and 17 April, not 7 April, 1761. DSB gives the same dates as index to BR. Box file of additional information in Room 115.
